name: traefik
preInstallNotes: We recommend a minimum of 0.5 CPUs and 256 MB of RAM available for the Traefik DCOS Service.
postInstallNotes:
Traefik DCOS Service has been successfully installed!
See https://docs.traefik.io for documentation.
postUninstallNotes: Traefik DCOS Service has been uninstalled and will no longer run.
